title: Apple Arcade Adding These 15 New Games Through Early January
content:
Apple today announced that an additional 15 games are coming to Apple Arcade during the upcoming holiday season.


Here is the full list of games coming to Apple Arcade through early January:

  • Skate City: New York

  • Talking Tom Blast Park

  • FINAL FANTASY IV (3D REMAKE)+

  • Gears & Goo (Apple Vision Pro)

  • Boggle: Arcade Edition

  • PAC-MAN 256+

  • Hot Wheels: Race Off+

  • Barbie Color Creations+

  • Little Cities: Diorama (Apple Vision Pro)

  • FF IV: THE AFTER YEARS+

  • Three Kingdoms HEROES

  • FINAL FANTASY+

  • Trials of Mana+

  • Rodeo Stampede+

  • Itâ€™s Literally Just Mowing+


Accessible through the App Store, Apple Arcade is a subscription-based service that provides access to hundreds of games, all free of ads and in-app purchases. In the U.S., Apple Arcade costs $6.99 per month and is bundled in select Apple One plans.
